message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CE, cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS 

The paper discusses a new approach for crowdsourcing prediction tasks that draws heavily from the concept of prediction markets. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG) as it discusses machine learning competitions such as the Netflix Prize. Additionally, the paper proposes a collaborative learning mechanism, which could fall under the sub-category of Computational Economics and Finance (cs.CE). The use of prediction markets also suggests that the paper could belong to the sub-category of Game Theory (cs.GT). The paper also discusses the incentive structure for participants, which could fall under the sub-category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper proposes a framework for modifying hypotheses, which could fall under the sub-category of Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS).
